SEARCH
Module git7sproject
Package git7s.flashcardai

Class Card

java.lang.Object
git7s.flashcardai.Card
public class Card extends Object
A Simple Card Class that represents a flashcard - linking the question to the subject, topic and user.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(int userID, String topic, String subject, String front, String back)
      Constructs a new Card with the specified userID, topic, subject, front and back. CardID is autoincremented by SQL.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user who made the card.
      topic - The name of the topic the card belongs to
      subject - The name of the subject the card belongs to
      front - The front text of the flashcard
      back - The back text of the flashcard.

    • Card

      public int getUserID()
